country_decisions = {
	unite_nepal = {
		major = yes
		potential = {
			tag = NPL
			AND = {
				OR = {
					has_reform = tribal_amalgamation
					has_reform = tribal_democracy_legacy
				}
			}
		}
		allow = {
			OR = {
				ai = no
				is_year = 1768
			}
		}
		effect = {
			change_government = monarchy
			add_government_reform = divine_right
			add_government_reform = delegated_rulers
			add_government_reform = hereditary_elite
			hidden_effect = {
				set_legacy_government = despotic_monarchy
			}
			set_legacy_government = feudal_monarchy
			remove_country_modifier = title_1
			remove_country_modifier = title_2
			remove_country_modifier = title_3
			remove_country_modifier = title_4
			remove_country_modifier = title_6
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = title_5
				duration = -1
			}
			clr_country_flag = title_1
			clr_country_flag = title_2
			clr_country_flag = title_3
			clr_country_flag = title_4
			clr_country_flag = title_5
			clr_country_flag = title_6
			define_ruler = {
				name = "Prithvi Narayana"
				dynasty = "Shah"
				DIP = 6
				ADM = 5
				MIL = 6
			}
			define_heir = {
				claim = 100
				name = "Pratapa Simha"
				dynasty = "Shah"
				DIP = 3
				ADM = 1
				MIL = 5
			}
			562 = {
				add_permanent_claim = NPL
			}
			523 = {
				add_permanent_claim = NPL
			}
			2701 = {
				add_permanent_claim = NPL
			}
			3113 = {
				add_permanent_claim = NPL
			}
			3112 = {
				add_permanent_claim = NPL
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
	unite_bhutan = {
		major = yes
		potential = {
			tag = BHU
			AND = {
				OR = {
					has_reform = tribal_amalgamation
					has_reform = tribal_democracy_legacy
				}
			}
		}
		allow = {
			OR = {
				ai = no
				is_year = 1616
			}
		}
		effect = {
			change_government = monarchy
			add_government_reform = divine_right
			add_government_reform = delegated_rulers
			add_government_reform = hereditary_elite
			hidden_effect = {
				set_legacy_government = despotic_monarchy
			}
			set_legacy_government = feudal_monarchy
			remove_country_modifier = title_1
			remove_country_modifier = title_2
			remove_country_modifier = title_3
			remove_country_modifier = title_5
			remove_country_modifier = title_6
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = title_4
				duration = -1
			}
			clr_country_flag = title_1
			clr_country_flag = title_2
			clr_country_flag = title_3
			clr_country_flag = title_4
			clr_country_flag = title_5
			clr_country_flag = title_6
			define_ruler = {
				name = "Ngawang Namgyal"
				dynasty = "Wangchuck"
				DIP = 6
				ADM = 6
				MIL = 5
			}
			define_heir = {
				claim = 100
				name = "Pekar Jungney"
				dynasty = "Wangchuck"
				DIP = 3
				ADM = 3
				MIL = 3
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
	unite_sikkim = {
		major = yes
		potential = {
			tag = SKK
			AND = {
				OR = {
					has_reform = tribal_amalgamation
					has_reform = tribal_democracy_legacy
				}
			}
		}
		allow = {
			OR = {
				ai = no
				is_year = 1642
			}
		}
		effect = {
			change_government = monarchy
			add_government_reform = divine_right
			add_government_reform = delegated_rulers
			add_government_reform = hereditary_elite
			hidden_effect = {
				set_legacy_government = despotic_monarchy
			}
			set_legacy_government = feudal_monarchy
			remove_country_modifier = title_1
			remove_country_modifier = title_3
			remove_country_modifier = title_4
			remove_country_modifier = title_5
			remove_country_modifier = title_6
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = title_2
				duration = -1
			}
			clr_country_flag = title_1
			clr_country_flag = title_2
			clr_country_flag = title_3
			clr_country_flag = title_4
			clr_country_flag = title_5
			clr_country_flag = title_6
			define_ruler = {
				name = "Phuntsog"
				dynasty = "Namgyal"
				DIP = 3
				ADM = 4
				MIL = 3
			}
			define_heir = {
				claim = 100
				name = "Tensung"
				dynasty = "Namgyal"
				DIP = 2
				ADM = 3
				MIL = 1
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
	unite_derbent = {
		major = yes
		potential = {
			tag = GAZ
			AND = {
				OR = {
					has_reform = tribal_amalgamation
					has_reform = tribal_democracy_legacy
				}
			}
		}
		allow = {
			OR = {
				ai = no
				is_year = 1550
			}
		}
		effect = {
			change_government = tribal
			add_government_reform = tribal_federation
			set_legacy_government = tribal_federation_legacy
			remove_country_modifier = title_1
			remove_country_modifier = title_3
			remove_country_modifier = title_4
			remove_country_modifier = title_5
			remove_country_modifier = title_6
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = title_2
				duration = -1
			}
			clr_country_flag = title_1
			clr_country_flag = title_2
			clr_country_flag = title_3
			clr_country_flag = title_4
			clr_country_flag = title_5
			clr_country_flag = title_6
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
	unite_circasia = {
		major = yes
		potential = {
			tag = CIR
			AND = {
				OR = {
					has_reform = tribal_amalgamation

			set_legacy_government = tribal_federation_legacy
			remove_country_modifier = title_1
			remove_country_modifier = title_2
			remove_country_modifier = title_4
			remove_country_modifier = title_5

			add_country_modifier = {
				name = title_3
				duration = -1
			}
			clr_country_flag = title_1
			clr_country_flag = title_2

			clr_country_flag = title_4
			clr_country_flag = title_5
			clr_country_flag = title_6
			set_country_flag = title_3
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
	unite_baluchistan = {
		major = yes
		potential = {
			tag = BAL
			AND = {
				OR = {
					has_reform = tribal_amalgamation
					has_reform = tribal_democracy_legacy
				}
			}
		}
		allow = {
			OR = {
				ai = no
				is_year = 1666
			}
		}
		effect = {
			change_government = monarchy
			add_government_reform = divine_right
			add_government_reform = delegated_rulers
			add_government_reform = hereditary_elite
			hidden_effect = {
				set_legacy_government = despotic_monarchy
			}
			set_legacy_government = feudal_monarchy
			remove_country_modifier = title_1
			remove_country_modifier = title_2
			remove_country_modifier = title_3
			remove_country_modifier = title_5
			remove_country_modifier = title_6
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = title_4
				duration = -1
			}
			clr_country_flag = title_1
			clr_country_flag = title_2
			clr_country_flag = title_3
			clr_country_flag = title_4
			clr_country_flag = title_5
			clr_country_flag = title_6
			define_ruler = {
				name = "Ahmad"
				dynasty = "Mirwani"
				DIP = 5
				ADM = 3
				MIL = 5
			}
			define_heir = {
				claim = 100
				name = "Mehrab"
				dynasty = "Mirwani"
				DIP = 3
				ADM = 3
				MIL = 3
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
	unite_turkomans = {
		major = yes
		potential = {
			tag = KHO
			AND = {
				OR = {
					has_reform = tribal_amalgamation

				}
			}

			set_country_flag = title_3

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}

	unite_manipur = {
		major = yes
		potential = {
			tag = MLB
			AND = {
				OR = {
					has_reform = tribal_amalgamation

			factor = 1

	unite_tripura = {
		major = yes
		potential = {
			tag = TPR
			AND = {
				OR = {
					has_reform = tribal_amalgamation

			factor = 1
		}
	}
	unite_under_the_wahabis = {
		major = yes
		potential = {
			OR = {
				tag = ANZ
				tag = SMM
				tag = BHA
				tag = BTA
				tag = BKI
				tag = BYA
				tag = BKA
			}
			AND = {
				OR = {
					has_reform = tribal_amalgamation
					has_reform = tribal_democracy_legacy
				}
			}
		}
		allow = {
			OR = {
				ai = no
				is_religion_enabled = wahhabi
			}
		}
		effect = {
			change_government = tribal
			add_government_reform = tribal_kingdom
			set_legacy_government = tribal_kingdom_legacy
			remove_country_modifier = title_1
			remove_country_modifier = title_3
			remove_country_modifier = title_4
			remove_country_modifier = title_5
			remove_country_modifier = title_6
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = title_2
				duration = -1
			}
			clr_country_flag = title_1
			clr_country_flag = title_2
			clr_country_flag = title_3
			clr_country_flag = title_4
			clr_country_flag = title_5
			clr_country_flag = title_6
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
	no_war_amalgamation = {
		major = yes
		potential = {
			AND = {
				OR = {
					has_reform = tribal_amalgamation
					has_reform = tribal_democracy_legacy
				}
			}
		}
		allow = {
			is_at_war = yes
		}
		effect = {
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					war_with = ROOT
				}
				white_peace = ROOT
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}
